alert.note: Alert for Barry; Stone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 6:19PM CDT until August 09 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Stone County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Barry County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 619 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Galena, or 11 miles northwest of Kimberling City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Table Rock Lake, Galena, Mccord Bend, Jenkins, Cape Fair, Wheelerville and Elsey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Missouri.
